item.title: Nice
item.description: Rusty Nails is a mad man. METAL MOVIESIDE - MAY 3 - FIRESIDE BOWL (2646 W. Fullerton) - ALL AGES 5PM SHARP - EARLY SHOW - $8 - 1.773.486.2700 Bands: Pelican Blood Hag (Seattle) Behold the Living Corpse Summer Dying (Michigan) Knuckle Drager (Canada) Plus Metal, Punk, and Horror Movies Including: Heavy Metal Parking Lot, The Locust, Arab on Radar, Judas Priest, Bon Jovi Karaoke, Gore Cartoons, GI JOE Cartoons, Walls of Jericho, Skate Videos, and much more.
